BESA.Kernel.Agent

Class PeriodicGuardBESA

  • java.lang.Object
    • BESA.Kernel.Agent.GuardBESA
      • BESA.Kernel.Agent.PeriodicGuardBESA

  • public abstract class PeriodicGuardBESA
extends GuardBESA
    This class implements the call periodic of the a periodic guard.
    Since:
    JDK1.0
